a.h1: Galatia CUSD #1 Home of the Bearcats

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: The GGS Drama Club would like students to please return your Lion King Jr scripts to the high school when you pick up or turn in packets. Thank you.

Emails have been sent to all junior students regarding scheduling for next school year. Please check to make sure you got the email. If you have any questions please reach out to Mrs. Launius. Thank you.

Parents, Meals will be delivered this week on Monday and Wednesday. Next week we will resume our food delivery on Monday and Thursday. If you have questions please call the school office.
Thank you

As many of you know we lost one of our own, Tyler Anderson, last night in a car accident. Tyler was a junior at Galatia High School. He was an active member of FFA and Trapcats. Our thoughts and prayers go out to his family and friends at this time. This news comes as a huge shock to everyone. Galatia School District wants to make sure to provide our students with resources as they are grieving this loss. First, there will be counselors available by phone through WOVSED. To reach one of these counselors, any student can call 618-8 41-8282 Monday-Friday during the hours of 8:00AM-3:30 PM. If you need to reach a counselor after hours, call Saline County dispatch at 618-252-8661, and tell them you need to talk to a counselor. Second, Illinois has set up a hotline during this COVID-19 pandemic called Call 4 Calm. Students can text the word “TALK” to 552020 and a counselor will call them. Lastly, Galatia staff understands that many students prefer to talk to someone they know and trust during times like these. Please reach out to a trusted staff member if you need to talk.
Tune in tomorrow morning at 8am and listen to one of our very own Bearcat Senior Aj Hankins & GHS Nick Triplett as they talk local sports! You won't be disappointed! view image

p.a: Event: No Student Attendance- Teacher Institute
